name: Last Exit
description: '''Last Exit''' was an American [[free jazz]] supergroup, composed of electric guitarist [[Sonny Sharrock]], drummer/occasional vocalist [[Ronald Shannon Jackson]], saxophonist [[Peter Br√∂tzmann]], and bass guitarist [[Bill Laswell]]. They were active from 1986 to the early 1990s, releasing primarily [[live album]]s recorded in Europe. Sharrock's death in 1994 caused the dissolution of the band, though touring of the band had not occurred for several years before his demise. The band is unrelated to the 1970s British [[jazz fusion]] [[Last Exit (British band)|band of the same name]].
